Package it.polimi.myShelfie.application

Class GUIClient

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.myShelfie.application.GUIClient
public class GUIClient extends javafx.application.Application
Graphic User Interface client. It's important to say that GUIClient is only a graphic mapping of Client. So, the methods called are the same; only the way they're called is different.
